time.description: Attack duration in ms, zero-padded to 5 digits.
Decay duration in ms, zero-padded to 5 digits.

level.description: Sustain level 0–100, integer, zero-padded to 3 digits.

time.description: Release duration in ms, zero-padded to 5 digits.

description: Attack: [curve][time], Decay: [curve][time], Sustain: [level], Release: [curve][time]. Example: ENVf00025f00120089f00050 (attack 25 ms with 'f' curve, decay 120 ms with 'f' curve, sustain 089, release 50 ms with 'f' curve).
